replies.body:
Hi ghost hypixel egirl dater. I met you like 2 ish months ago and so far, I've found that we get along really well with our memes and stuff like that LOL. You've gone from some kiddo I dislike and I was like how tf did this boi get a 3kd to one of my best friends on the minecraft Avicus server. Also, you and I are best builders in build battle we should be map dev. That's about it for opinion...except you bad at minecraft pvp :3

pretty sure I'm gonna get demoted before you LOL

replies.body:
Hi R O C K Y (Tay Tay) you were one of the first people I talked to when I came back to the craft after a 6 month break and you allowed me into your team which lead to my starting in the competitive scene, so thanks for that lol. I remember when you were trash at pvp and I could just hold w and click 2 cps and best you, but now you've gotten pretty good (i think because of gaming shirt) and I actually have to blockhit and sweat to beat you. As a person, I always enjoy talking with you because you are really open and we have some good memes together.

HI

I SWEAR IF YOU ASK 50000 questions I'm gonna IGNORE your minecraft messages 


HOME, Celestial is bad

rockyyyyy...who is that ocds casual randy

fatlesbian, because it is meme name and I stole it from okiba

megan is still legend

ily2   N E R D

replies.body:
Hello seuth Y

i am fiveurf 

i give you crinemaft opiniomion first
yeah so seuthy I'm gonna talk "normal now"...I've only met you/ talked with you for like the past 2ish months and you're a really fun person to associate with. We share similar humour and sometimes similar ping. I used to think that you were black but then I was told you were white so rip...you're very good at the craft and you have a really easy to work with personality. That's about it seuthboi, I hope we stay in CONTACT after this mineman server dies

I think so??? We've fought a couple times in public...my previous names were fatlesbian, c4ncer, etc

tbh my fav eeveelution would be umbreon but that name was taken ;-;

i just chose vaporeon because Canadian spelling of vapor is vapour 

i think uhmbreon is also a pretty cool name 

jolteon is too fast

flareon is "ok"

i have never used a leafeon 

espeon is good for sweep

vaporeon is decent j guess

eevee is ok

glaceon has my second favourite design

idk the name of the fairy one, but it looks cool I guess
